scripts.prepare:sepolia: mustache config/sepolia.json config/subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/sepolia.json config/static.constants.template.ts > src/constants/static.ts
scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json config/subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.json config/static.constants.template.ts > src/constants/static.ts
